# Treemaps

```{r}
# Load packages
library(treemapify)
```

## A simple treemap

```{r}
p <- ggplot(G20, aes(area = gdp_mil_usd, fill = hdi)) +
  geom_treemap()

p
```

## A simple treemap with text

```{r}
p <- ggplot(G20, aes(area = gdp_mil_usd, fill = hdi, label = country)) +
  geom_treemap() +
  geom_treemap_text(
    fontface = "italic", 
    colour = "white", 
    place = "centre",
    grow = TRUE
  )

p
```
